name: ue4-intellisense-fixes
description: Automatically fixes UE4 Intellisense on startup.
license: SEE LICENSE IN THE FILE: LICENSE

UE4IntellisenseFixes.v426.fix.enableNoCo.description: (major) In compileCommands_YourProject.json, the compiler is left blank and breaks Intellisense.

UE4IntellisenseFixes.v426.fix.enableWron.description: (median) When switching to another already created project, UE4's c_cpp_properties.json will have the wrong compileCommands path and name.

UE4IntellisenseFixes.v426.fix.enableUE4S.description: (minor) UE4 Source files aren't in compileCommands so we need to setup backup Intellisense settings to prevent errors from showing in UE4 Source files.

UE4IntellisenseFixes.v426.pathSubstring.description: Don't change unless this extension can't identify your UE4 version. Use a small unique substring of your UE4 4.26 path.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
